data.name: Funny Street Football
data.detailed_description:
The rules of the game of football are known to everyone: kick the ball into the opponent's goal and make sure that he suddenly does not end up in your goal. It would seem that the task could not be easier, but when the title of world champion is at stake, this simple concept begins to turn into a complex mix of strategy and dexterity, where the main task is to maintain balance. these two components and score a goal. But the rules get even harder when it all goes into 2D.

Introducing Funny Street Football - a 2D side-view sports simulator in which you have to win the street football world championship!

A wide selection of teams gives the player the opportunity to take part in such a passionate and difficult competition for the Champion's Cup on behalf of many countries, adapting to the situation on the field, artificial intelligence keeps even the most dexterous players in suspense throughout the match due to its speed of reaction to situations and the unpredictability of further action, and the locations of the courtyards, in which for many years local children and adults have been playing the beloved game of everyone, will not let you get bored!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 61 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard
